PotentialOrb.NAME: Potential Orb
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, increases it's #yPotency by #b

KineticOrb.NAME: Kinetic Orb
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, decreases it's #yPotency by #b1/
At the start of every turn, decreases it's #yPotency to #r0. Deals #b

MagneticOrb.NAME: Magnetic Orb
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, increases it's #yPotency by #b
for every #yMagnetic Orb currently chanelled. When #yEvoked, Gain #b

ThermalOrb.NAME: Thermal Orb
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, swaps it's position with the orb in front of it. Deals #b

NuclearOrb.NAME: Nuclear Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yDamage to #ra #rrandom #renemy and #yChannels #b2 #yNuclear Orbs with half the Potency. Damage dealt by this Orb is #rNOT considered as Attack damage.
